      • respawnPlayerWithPowerup

        protected java.lang.String respawnPlayerWithPowerup(Player playerToRespawn,
                                                    int powerupID)
        handle the respwawn of the player. Returns a message string if there's an error
        Parameters:
        playerToRespawn - the player you want to repawn
        powerupID - the powerup discarded by the player
        Returns:
        a string message if there's an error. Otherwise null.

      • connectionDontPassTurn

        protected void connectionDontPassTurn(boolean isConnected)
        it disconnettes the player withou passing the turn. Use it for states where it's not the player turn
        Parameters:
        isConnected - false if the player is disconnected, true if not
